item.title: The Metadata Mess
item.dc:creator: Alex Hamilton
item.description: This week has been a bit of a detour and here’s why. For those of you not familiar with the way scientific data and observations are stored they generally use FITS files with the image/data and a header containing metadata. This metadata is essentially a form of key/value pair containing details suc ...READ MORE...
